remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [XML 数据源Sources of XML Data](#source_of_xml_data) - [更新 XML 数据Updating XML Data](#updating_xml_data) - [指定 XSL 转换Specifying an XSL Transformation](#specifying_an_xsl_transformation) - [使用 XPath 表达式进行筛选Filtering using an XPath Expression](#filtering_using_an_xpath_expression) - [缓存Caching](#caching) - [其他功能Additional Features](#additional_features) - [数据视图对象Data View Object](#data_view_object) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 简介Introduction 控件是向数据绑定控件呈现 XML 数据的数据源控件。The control is a data source control that presents XML data to data-bound controls. 数据绑定控件可使用 控件来显示层次结构数据和表格数据。The control can be used by data-bound controls to display both hierarchical and tabular data. 控件通常用于在只读方案中显示分层的 XML 数据。The control is typically used to display hierarchical XML data in read-only scenarios. 由于 控件扩展了 类，因此它适用于分层数据。Because the control extends the class, it works with hierarchical data. 控件还实现了 接口，并处理表格或列表格式的数据。The control also implements the interface and works with tabular, or list-style, data. > [!NOTE] > 出于安全目的，没有任何 控件属性存储在视图状态中。For security purposes, none of the control properties are stored in view state. 由于在技术上可能会对客户端上的视图状态的内容进行解码，因此，存储有关数据结构或其内容的敏感信息可能会向您显示信息泄露威胁。Since it is technically possible to decode the contents of view state on the client, storing sensitive information about the data structure or its contents could expose you to an information disclosure threat. 请注意，如果需要将 属性等信息存储在视图状态中，则可以通过在 `@ Page` 指令上设置 来启用加密来保护内容。Note that if you need to store information such as property in view state, you can enable encryption to protect the contents by setting on the `@ Page` directive. 页面开发人员使用 控件来显示使用数据绑定控件的 XML 数据。Page developers use the control to display XML data using data-bound controls. ## XML 数据源Sources of XML Data 通常从 XML 文件加载 XML 数据，该文件由 属性指定。The typically loads XML data from an XML file, which is specified by the property. 还可以使用 属性，以字符串形式直接将 XML 数据存储在字符串形式中。XML data can also be stored directly by the data source control in string form using the property. 如果要在数据绑定控件显示 XML 数据之前对其进行转换，则可以为转换提供可扩展样式表语言（XSL）样式表。If you want to transform the XML data before it is displayed by a data-bound control, you can provide an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) style sheet for the transformation. 对于 XML 数据，通常从文件加载样式表（由 属性指示），但也可以使用 属性直接将它存储在字符串格式中。As with the XML data, you typically load the style sheet from a file, indicated by the property, but you can also store it in string form directly using the property. ## 更新 XML 数据Updating XML Data 控件通常用于只读数据方案，其中的数据绑定控件显示 XML 数据。The control is commonly used in read-only data scenarios where a data-bound control displays XML data. 不过，还可以使用 控件编辑 XML 数据。However, you can also use the control to edit XML data. 若要编辑 XML 数据，请调用 方法来检索 对象，该对象是 XML 数据的内存中表示形式。To edit the XML data, call the method to retrieve an object that is an in-memory representation of the XML data. 您可以使用由 公开的对象模型以及它所包含的 对象，也可以使用 XPath 筛选表达式来操作文档中的数据。You can use the object model exposed by the and objects it contains or use an XPath filtering expression to manipulate data in the document. 更改 XML 数据的内存中表示形式后，可以通过调用 方法将其保存到磁盘。When you have made changes to the in-memory representation of the XML data, you can save it to disk by calling the method. 控件的编辑功能有一些限制：There are some restrictions to the editing capabilities of the control: - 必须从由 属性指示的 XML 文件（而不是在 属性中指定的内联 XML）加载 XML 数据。The XML data must be loaded from an XML file that is indicated by the property, not from inline XML specified in the property. - 不能在 或 属性中指定 XSLT 转换。No XSLT transformation can be specified in the or properties. - 方法不处理不同请求的并发保存操作。The method does not handle concurrent save operations by different requests. 如果有多个用户通过 编辑 XML 文件，则不能保证所有用户都使用相同的数据。If more than one user is editing an XML file through the , there is no guarantee that all users are operating with the same data. 由于这些并发性问题， 操作也可能会失败。It is also possible for a operation to fail due to these same concurrency issues. ## 指定 XSL 转换Specifying an XSL Transformation 使用 XML 数据执行的常见操作是将其从一个 XML 数据集转换为另一个。A common operation performed with XML data is transforming it from one XML data set into another. 控件支持具有 和 属性的 XML 转换，这些属性指定在将 XML 数据传递到数据绑定控件之前要应用于 XML 数据的 XSL 样式表，以及用于在转换过程中提供 XSL 样式表使用的动态 XSLT 样式表参数的 属性。The control supports XML transformations with the and properties, which specify an XSL style sheet to apply to XML data before it is passed to a data-bound control, and the property, which enables you to supply dynamic XSLT style sheet arguments to be used by an XSL style sheet during the transformation. 如果使用 属性指定 XPath 筛选表达式，则在进行转换之后应用。If you specify an XPath filtering expression using the property, it is applied after the transformation takes place. > [!NOTE] > 类使用弃用的 类来执行 XSL 转换。The class uses the deprecated class to perform XSL transformations. 如果要使用在已弃用 类后引入的样式表功能，请使用 类手动应用转换。If you want to use style sheet features that were introduced after the class was deprecated, apply the transforms manually by using the class. ## 使用 XPath 表达式进行筛选Filtering using an XPath Expression 默认情况下， 控件加载由 属性标识的 XML 文件中的所有 XML 数据，或在 属性中以内联方式找到该文件，但你可以使用 XPath 表达式来筛选数据。By default, the control loads all the XML data in the XML file identified by the property or found inline in the property, but you can filter the data using an XPath expression. 属性支持 XPath 语法筛选器，该筛选器在 XML 数据加载和转换后应用。The property supports an XPath-syntax filter that is applied after XML data is loaded and transformed. ## 缓存Caching 出于性能方面的考虑，默认情况下为 控件启用了缓存。For performance purposes, caching is enabled for the control by default. 每次请求页面时在服务器上打开和读取 XML 文件都可以降低应用程序的性能。Opening and reading an XML file on the server every time a page requested can reduce the performance of your application. 通过缓存，可以在 Web 服务器上的内存开销内降低服务器上的处理负载;在大多数情况下，这是一个很好的权衡。Caching lets you reduce the processing load on your server at the expense of memory on the Web server; in most cases this is a good trade-off. 当 属性设置为 `true`时， 会自动缓存数据， 属性设置为缓存失效前缓存存储数据的秒数。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true`, and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache is invalidated. 您可以使用 进一步微调数据源控件的缓存行为。You can use the to further fine-tune the caching behavior of the data source control. ## 数据视图对象Data View Object 由于 控件支持显示分层数据的数据绑定控件以及显示表格数据的控件，因此数据源控件支持其基础 XML 数据的多种类型的数据源视图对象。Because the control supports data-bound controls that display hierarchical data as well as controls that display tabular data, the data source control supports multiple types of data source view objects on its underlying XML data. 控件在与显示表格数据的数据绑定控件一起使用时，将检索单个命名 对象。The control retrieves a single named object when used with a data-bound control that displays tabular data. 方法标识此单个命名视图。The method identifies this single named view. 与显示分层数据的数据绑定控件一起使用时， 控件将为传递到 方法的任何唯一分层路径检索 。When used with a data-bound control that displays hierarchical data, the control retrieves an for any unique hierarchical path passed to the method. ##
